topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539c8e1563687224cbf20500#post_539c8e1563687224cbf20500

5 would be about the various news outlets who use interviews to try and give them a bad image, and how often they fail.
4 would be about the charity work done
3 would just talk about artists, animators and even the cast members
2 would revolve around Down with Molestia, Derpygate, Alicorn Twilight and so on
and 1? Well, it should be even more self explanatory than the last ones.

I'm thinking of bringing up those who want to marry certain characters "or already have" and just say how many want them to piss off just as much as the non-fans do.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@ThatRandomGuy42":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539c90706368721b52640000#post_539c90706368721b52640000
Do it!
For the justice of the sanity of this fandom.
Then again, if they want to make themselves look stupid by expressing their fondness of the series in their own awkward way. No one is stopping them. But let people on the outside know, that these people are very marginal minorities of the fandom. Other fandoms definitely have these types of people. I've had my share of inside look at various prominent anime fandoms such as Touhou, and believe me, this kind of shit is no where near being restricted to one or few fandoms.
